Current Question Text: CT Colonoscopy. Also known as a virtual colonoscopy or CT colonography, a special CAT scan of the lower part of your colon that made detailed pictures of your colon to see if there were colon polyps or cancer. Your body passed through a large tunnel-shaped X-ray machine.
IMS Review Notes: Added spaces before and after the equal sign. Populated col C,D,F,H,J,M, and AG
